page.title: 17PEOPLE'S LIKES AND DISLIKES
page.content: The main things that people like about Barling are the countryside, the peacefulness and the wild life. Most people find it a friendly place to live in. The main things that people dislike about Barling are the heavy lorries going to the pit. There have been complaints of things falling off the skip lorries. People feel that they go too fast and damage the roads. Some people thought that the bus service was poor. Others were worried about the yacht club wanting to come to the creek. This might mean more cars going through the village. Some people said that they did not dislike any thing at all.
